description:
Powerful desktop PDF solution to create and edit PDF documents and integrate with Foxit eSign.


New Features and Improvements in Foxit PDF Editor Subscription Release 2025.3.0.35737
- New features and enhancements for AI Assistant
  - Add AI powered image generation from text prompts or reference photos, and AI driven image editing inside PDFs.
  - Enable exporting AI Assistant responses, including summaries, reports, and insights, directly to Word or PDF.
  - Support additional languages for translations and AI responses.
  - Make Document Summary easier to access with a new ribbon button and panel, allowing users to extract key information without extra clicks.
- The enhanced Comment feature
  - Enable proper display and editing of comments generated by external PDF editors.
  - Easily create a CSV summary of your PDF comments with customizable columns, allowing you to select desired comment types, page ranges, and sorting options before export.
  - Add the ability to save custom annotations as favorites/templates in the Favorite Toolbox panel of the navigation pane for easy reuse.
- The Create Sequential Stamp feature automatically updates with sequential numbers or letters each time a stamp is applied, streamlining labeling for healthcare, legal, and version control workflows.
- Add settings to remove hidden information (including metadata, embedded content, and scripts) from PDFs before closing them or emailing them using the PDF Editorâ€™s Email feature.
- Other enhancements to the user experience.
Issues Addressed in Foxit PDF Editor Subscription Release 2025.3.0.35737
- Fixed some security and stability issues. Click here for details.
